Magnitude

A Simple Tool to Help Prioritize Usability Issues

2 minute read

Frequency and Impact

Frequency

  1. Almost never
  2. Rarely
  3. Occasionally
  4. Frequent
  5. Almost always

Impact

  1. Insignificant \2. \3. \4.
  2. Show-stopper

Magnitude = Frequency x Impact

The basic gist is that, the larger the number, the more important the issue is to address.

You can then create regions to help prioritize issues.
